name: Pony Joust
description:
An easy to learn arcade-style game with a surprising amount of hidden depth.

Compete in a jousting tournament with minigames sprinkled in to beat your high score!

Also features split-screen combat!  See who's the best out of your friends!

Join in the competition to win $50 AUD!


Post your score on this discord server!

https://discord.gg/T4fM4KpD

Good luck :D
